Submodules¶

mcscript.compiler.CompileState module¶

class mcscript.compiler.CompileState.CompileState(code: str, compileFunction: Callable, config: mcscript.data.Config.Config)¶

Bases: object

This class keeps track of the current state of the compilation

currentNamespace() → mcscript.compiler.Namespace.Namespace¶
property expressionStack¶

shortcut for expressionStack.currentNamespace().expressionStack. Used by a lot of old code.

toResource(value: mcscript.lang.resource.base.ResourceBase.Resource) → mcscript.lang.resource.base.ResourceBase.Resource¶

Converts a value to a resource. similar to ´load´ but does not actually load the resource.

Returns

mcscript.compiler.Namespace module¶

class mcscript.compiler.Namespace.Namespace(identification: int, previous: Optional[mcscript.compiler.Namespace.Namespace] = None, namespaceType: mcscript.compiler.NamespaceType.NamespaceType = <NamespaceType.OTHER: 6>)¶

Bases: mcscript.utils.NamespaceBase.NamespaceBase

addFunction(function: Union[BuiltinFunction, FunctionResource])¶
addVar(identifier: str, resourceClass: Type[mcscript.lang.resource.base.ResourceBase.ValueResource]) → mcscript.lang.resource.base.ResourceBase.ValueResource¶

Adds a variable to the current namespace even if there exists already one in a predecessor namespace.

Parameters

  • identifier – the identifier of the variable in code

  • resourceClass – the class of the resource to be added

Returns

the resource

setPredecessor(predecessor: mcscript.compiler.Namespace.Namespace)¶
setVar(identifier: str, var: mcscript.lang.resource.base.ResourceBase.Resource)¶

Sets a variable. If this variable is defined in an older namespace, override it.

Parameters

  • identifier – the name of the variable

  • var – the value of the variable

mcscript.compiler.NamespaceType module¶

class mcscript.compiler.NamespaceType.NamespaceType¶

Bases: enum.Enum

Each namespace can have a different type. The global namespace will have type GLOBAL, a namespace for a struct would have STRUCT.

BLOCK = 5¶
FUNCTION = 2¶
GLOBAL = 1¶
METHOD = 4¶
OTHER = 6¶
STRUCT = 3¶

mcscript.compiler.tokenConverter module¶

Converts Tokens to their corresponding resources.

mcscript.compiler.tokenConverter.DATATYPE(token: Token, compileState: CompileState) → Union[Type[Resource], StructResource]¶
mcscript.compiler.tokenConverter.DECIMAL(token: Token, _: CompileState) → Resource¶
mcscript.compiler.tokenConverter.NUMBER(token: Token, _: CompileState) → Resource¶
mcscript.compiler.tokenConverter.SELECTOR(token: Token, _: CompileState)¶
mcscript.compiler.tokenConverter.STRING(token: Token, compileState: CompileState) → Resource¶
mcscript.compiler.tokenConverter.convertToken(token: Union[Token, str], compileState: CompileState) → Union[Resource, Type[Resource]]¶

Converts a by lark generated token to the appropriate resource class.

ToDo: instead of returning Type[Resource] return ResourceType

Parameters

  • token – the token

  • compileState – the compile state

Returns

either a resource or a resource class
